data.text: Excellent service, good breakfast and comfortable room. The only problem I encountered was that the AC didn't work, it wasn't a major inconvenience since I went during winter but if it was summer that room would be very hot.
data.title: Great experience and really comfortable.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you found our service excellent, enjoyed the breakfast, and found the room comfortable.

We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the AC not working properly. Your feedback is valuable, and we will address this issue to ensure a more comfortable stay for future guests. We appreciate your understanding.

We look forward to welcoming you back in the future. If there's anything specific we can improve upon for your next stay, please feel free to let us know.

Best regards,

Albert López
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Albert Lopez

data.title: Disappointing

data.text:
Absolutely disgusting.
Bathrooms full of mould, filth and nothing like what you see on the pictures. 
They clearly don’t have a clue when it comes to hygiene by allowing the shower head to clog up with that much limescale the water struggles to come out. 

Hotel is falling apart round the communal areas with wallpaper falling off the walls and fire hoses falling out the walls. 

Director takes no responsibility for his hotel after emailing me explaining how our comfort and satisfaction is his utmost priority however won’t do a thing for you except out a cheap €5.00 bottle of wine in your room. 

Moved us rooms and all you could smell was pure sewage that made us sick most days in a hot room. 

Internet is rubbish, staff can’t make a decision and all in all I would strongly recommend you find a different hotel. 

Even the most basic hotels have a standardised cleaning routine that this place clearly missed.
data.title: Absolutely disgusting

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Stewart,
Once again, we appreciate your stay at our hotel. 
As informed during your stay, cleanliness is one of the fundamental aspects in our standards, as we consider it essential for our guests' comfort. This is reflected in the positive comments we receive both onsite and online. We regret that your room was not in optimal condition upon arrival, and we promptly communicated this to you, offering a room upgrade to a higher category. We also regret that the complimentary wine offered did not meet your price expectations; it was intended as a gesture of goodwill. 
Regarding your comment about the fire hoses, please be informed that they are newly installed and currently under construction to comply with the latest fire safety regulations, which is a top priority for us. 
Our technical team has reviewed the wifi network, and it is functioning correctly. We have not received any complaints during your stay, and we have two fiber lines to ensure wifi coverage for our guests. 
Demanding a refund in exchange for not posting negative reviews online is unprofessional, especially coming from someone representing themselves as a hotel manager. Leaving without settling the outstanding bill is also not an elegant approach, as you have done. 
Once again, we thank you for your stay. 
Best regards,

Albert Lopez
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Albert Lopez

data.text: This hotel is great. It was clean, tidy perfect for me and my boyfriend. The staff at the hotel are very friendly and really helpful. We didn’t eat in the hotel so can’t comment on food but did have drinks in the bar on the roof and they were great and reasonably priced.
data.title: Great wee hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Emma,
Firstly we would like to thank you for the lovely review you shared following your recent visit to Sunotel Aston and are happy to see that we were able to match your holiday expectations. We thank you for pointing out the cleanliness of our installations and our friendly staff. We are also delighted that you enjoyed our Pool Lounge Bar, an ideal complement to relax and take delight in its fantastic views of the city.
Once more we thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to welcome you back on your next visit to Barcelona. 
Best Regards, 

Albert Lopez
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Albert Lopez

data.text: Very nice little hotel that checks all the boxes. Clean rooms, attentive staff, very good location, especially if you want to be close to Passieg da Gracia and admire Casa Mila and Casa Batllo just a short walk away. Subway station two blocks away. Hotel was updated, maintained, and clean. The pool and jacuzzi were an excellent addition. Staff was kind enough to arrange for a very early taxi to get to the airport. The hotel delivers what it says it will. Nicely done.
data.title: Tiny well located gem convenient for Gaudi fans.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Firstly we would like to thank you for the lovely review you shared following your recent visit to our Sunotel hotel and are happy to see that we were able to match your holiday expectations. We thank you for pointing out the cleanliness of our installations and our friendly staff. 
We also appreciate your reference to our rooftop, where you can explore all Barcelona drinking a cocktail.
Once more we thank you for sharing your experience with us and look forward to serving you again soon. 
Best Regards, 

Albert Lopez
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Albert Lopez
